com.stefanbrenner.droplet.service
Interface ISerialCommunicationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArduinoService
public interface ISerialCommunicationService

Interface for Serial Communication with a microcontroller.

Author:
Stefan Brenner

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns:
the name of the provider used for selection in the ui.

getPorts

gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier[] getPorts()
Returns all available serial ports.

Returns:
Array of available serial ports

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Indicates if the service is currently connected to a serial port.

Returns:
true if the serivce is connected, otherwise false

sendData

void sendData(java.lang.String message)
Send a message to the receiver.

Parameters:
message - message to send

close

void close()
This should be called when you stop using the port. This will prevent port locking on platforms like Linux.

connect

boolean connect(gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier portId,
                IDropletContext context)
Connect to a given serial port.

Parameters:
portId - port identifier to connect to
context - droplet context
Returns:
true if the connection was successfully established, false otherwise
